title: An assessment of the impact of traditional rice cooking practice and eating habits on arsenic and iron transfer into the food chain of smallholders of Indo-Gangetic plain of South-Asia: Using AMMI and Monte-Carlo simulation model
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Debojyoti Moulick, Dibakar Ghosh, Yogita Gharde, Arnab Majumdar, Munish Kumar Upadhyay, Deep Chakraborty, Subrata Mahanta, Anupam Das, Shuvasish Choudhury, Marian Brestic, Tahani Awad Alahmadi, Mohammad Javed Ansari, Shubhas Chandra Santra, Akbar Hossain
